title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 140.2 - Limitation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 140.2 - Limitation

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 640

The credit allowable under this Part may not reduce the

New York State personal income tax otherwise due from the nonresident
beneficiary to an amount less than the amount which would have been due if the
accumulation distribution and the New York modifications (net change)
applicable thereto were excluded from the beneficiary's New York adjusted gross
income. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
140.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
